name: Nishwarth Sarthak Prayas Avem Pariwar Kalyan Samiti
briefDescription: Niswarth Organization working with Sahariya primitive tribal group. The sahariyas are Indiaâ€™s most fragile and vulnerable tribal group, whose livelihoods basis is so severely undermined and whose nutritional status so severely threatened that they are now is a Civil Society Organization it working in the areas of rural development, Strengthening of Panchayati Raj Sansthan, child education and   women empowerment through advocacy, direct teetering precariously on the edge of extinction.Niswarth believes in mobilizing these tribal groups to get what is their due while at the same time sees itself as engaged in development work on the ground.
